creditline: Gift of Shelly Errington from the collection of her brother, Trois E. Johnson, M.D., and given in his memory
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: brown patina; standing woman with hands together in prayer; woman wears a headscarf over her shoulders that extends down to her skirt hem in back, with edging of circles between bands; very regular vertical folds in clothing on back
title: Figure of Mary (Assumption)
